pages.title: Nesoberi
pages.text: Meet your favorite Hasunosora school idols in nesoberi form! These plushies are perfect for cuddling and decorating your room.
Take the Tsuzuri nesoberi as an example. Recipes for small nesoberis might slightly differ in wool colors.
Once you have the small neso, craft the medium one with more oshi love!$(br2)The size of the nesoberi is indicated on the top left corner of the item.

pages.name: Neso Entity
pages.text: $(bold)Stealth-right-click$() a block to place the neso on the ground. Right-click it again to pick it up.
